citations.narrative:
Approximately, twelve of twenty-six bird enclosures housing sun parakeets, quaker parrots, and cockatiels contained
chipped paint and/or rust. Rusted and deteriorated surfaces are difficult to clean and sanitize and may compromise
structural integrity over time. Interior surfaces and surfaces that come in contact with birds must be free of rust or damage
that affects the structural integrity of the surface or prevents cleaning. Correct by September 10, 2025.

citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
The facility does not have an effective pest control program to control the pest population. Live roaches were observed in
the feed storage room and dish washing area. Pests such as roaches can affect the health and well-being of animals by
spreading disease and contaminating food, surfaces, and animal housing areas. A safe and effective program for the
control of insects, ectoparasites, and avian and mammalian pests shall be established and maintained. Correct by August
20,2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.150(c)(2) 
   
Facilities, general. 
Approximately, twelve of twenty-six bird enclosures housing sun parakeets, quaker parrots, and cockatiels contained 
chipped paint and/or rust. Rusted and deteriorated surfaces are difficult to clean and sanitize and may compromise 
structural integrity over time. Interior surfaces and surfaces that come in contact with birds must be free of rust or damage 
that affects the structural integrity of the surface or prevents cleaning. Correct by September 10, 2025. 
3.158(d) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
The facility does not have an effective pest control program to control the pest population. Live roaches were observed in 
the feed storage room and dish washing area. Pests such as roaches can affect the health and well-being of animals by 
spreading disease and contaminating food, surfaces, and animal housing areas. A safe and effective program for the 
control of insects, ectoparasites, and avian and mammalian pests shall be established and maintained. Correct by August 
20,2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
